name: Stack Attack (Lucas Z)
description:
Stack Attack is a block-stacking game made using the FastJ Game Engine.

  • Blocks will move across the screen, and it's your job to stop them and put them on the "stack" -- your tower of stopped blocks in the middle.
  • You can stop a block's movement at any point using the left mouse button (LMB).
  • Any part of the moving block that is not on top of the last stacked block will be cut off.
  • You get more points for stopping blocks right on top of each other. Go for as many points as you can!
